diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Growth Hormone and Insulin-Like Growth Factor I Insensitivity due to IKBKG/H9251 Mutation
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of GH resistance was made based on low IGF-I and IGFBP-3 levels, elevated GH secretion, and a poor response of the patient's fibroblasts to GH and IGF-I, indicating impaired signaling through the NF-ÎºB pathway due to the IKBKG/H9251 mutation.
